productTypes.title: Dry Mops - Cotton Acrylic Blue
productTypes.advantages: Heavy duty product used to clean public areas for dry dust sweeping. Used in malls, corporate office open lobbies, passages, hospitals and large restaurants.

Plastic frame 40cms / 60cms with cotton refill / acrylic blue refill

productTypes.title: Wet Dry Mops System - Microfiber
productTypes.usageArea: General Area, Pharma Labs, Production Area Cleaning
productTypes.advantages: Damp mop used to clean public area for dry and wet dust used in malls, corporate office open lobby, passages, hospitals and large restaurants. Refills can be machine washed up to 300 times.

Plastic easy fixed frame 40cms with Microfiber cloth pocket refill

additionalInfo.content: Clean machine / remove old refill, new refill spray for 3 to 5 times, check batteries / replace new wick
